FuncDef: The display bgp sr-policy ipv6 peer command is used to display the information of the specified BGP IPv6 SR-Policy address family.
Examples: Total number of peers : 1                 Peers in established state : 1
Peer            V          AS  MsgRcvd  MsgSent  OutQ  Up/Down       State  PrefRcv
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp peer command displays BGP peer information. You can implement the following operations based on the command output:
To check the status of BGP connections.To check information about a BGP peer.To check whether a BGP peer is configured using the peer as-number command.To check whether a BGP peer is deleted using the undo peer as-number command.
